snippet: For the three months that ended in January, Pandora had $81.3 million in revenue, up 71 percent from the same period the year before, and a net loss of $8.2 million.
abstract: For the three months that ended in January, Pandora had $81.3 million in revenue, up 71 percent from the same period the year before, and a net loss of $8.2 million.
